body_html: This appears to be because pyc files store the paths relative to where they were generated from. So if you run the python command that generates the pyc from the root directory in an environment with the same root, it will give you full paths and work properly. That being said, it would be great if we could make this work no matter what the relative paths were.

That being said, it would be great if we could make this work no matter what the relative paths were.
body: This appears to be because pyc files store the paths relative to where they were generated from.  So if you run the python command that generates the pyc from the root directory in an environment with the same root, it will give you full paths and work properly. That being said, it would be great if we could make this work no matter what the relative paths were.
